level.text: Checks or money orders shall be made payable to the “District of Columbia Water and Sewer Authority”.
Certified checks or cash shall be required for payments exceeding two hundred dollars ($ 200).
If any check or other instrument offered to make any payment due is dishonored, the owner or occupant shall be responsible for any fees established by WASA.
